name: RunMyProcess
tag_list: bpm, workflow, saas, google-apps, cloud-computing, paas, saas-integration, cloud-integration
overview:
RunMyProcess is a start-up that develops and operates an innovative Cloud-based platform as a service (PaaS)… The RunMyProcess platform makes use of business process management (BPM) concepts to provide a unique mix of structured workflows, integration and flexibility for business application development. By leveraging an easy-to-use, drag-and-drop graphical design and more than 1,200 pre-configured connectors for SaaS and other applications, as well as full integration with Google Apps, RunMyProcess’ customers can rapidly build and deploy highly customized business applications. Accessible on the Web through a browser, entirely based on a pay-per-use model, the RunMyProcess platform is less expensive and more flexible than on-premise solutions ensuring a quicker return on investment. RunMyProcess is already used by Enterprise customers around the world (France, US, Turkey, Singapore and Japan).

Customers are generally IT managers or businesses who manage large or complex (multi-site, multi-supplier…) networks and need to quickly create and deploy new business applications. They need to deploy new applications quickly and for little cost to different geographical locations. In many cases they are already looking at cloud solutions, in particular Google Apps, as an alternative to more traditional solutions.

RunMyProcess was distinguished by Gartner Inc. as a “Cool vendors” in 2009, recognizing its innovative, comprehensive and business focused offer. In 2010 Red Herring nominated RunMyProcess among the top 100 innovators in Europe.

funding_rounds.source_description: RunMyProcess secures 2,2M$ in Series A funding.

milestones.description: RunMyProcess wins Eurocloud France award for Best Cloud Offering 2011
